# Kristy Larson

**Type:** Wife  
**Relationship:** Married since 2015  
**Profession:** Pharmacist  
**Status:** Active

## Personal Details

**Marriage:** Married since 2015  
**Profession:** Pharmacist  
**Work Schedule:** Every other Saturday, 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM  
**Daily Routine:** Wakes up at 6:00 AM

## Daily Schedule

### **Morning Routine**
- **Wake Time:** 6:00 AM
- **Couple Time:** 30 minutes of talking and relaxing together
- **Preparation:** Starts getting ready after couple time
- **Departure:** Leaves around 8:00-8:15 AM

### **Work Schedule**
- **Frequency:** Every other Saturday
- **Hours:** 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (updated schedule)
- **Pattern:** Alternating weekends
- **Today (Sep 15, 2025):** Working 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

## Relationship Context

- **Marriage Duration:** 10 years (since 2015)
- **Quality Time:** Morning routine is important for connection
- **Work-Life Balance:** Pharmacist schedule affects weekend planning
- **Support System:** Key part of family support structure

## Planning Considerations

### **Weekend Planning**
- **Every Other Saturday:** Kristy works 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- **Free Saturdays:** Available for family time or personal projects
- **Work Saturdays:** Morning time available before 9:00 AM, evening free after 6:00 PM
- **Today (Sep 15, 2025):** Working 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM, leaves at 8:30 AM, returns around 6:30 PM

### **Daily Planning**
- **Morning Priority:** 30 minutes of couple time (6:00-6:30 AM)
- **Work Schedule:** Plan around her 8:00-8:15 AM departure
- **Evening Time:** Available for family activities

## Recent Updates

### **Marriage Counseling Session (Sep 27, 2025)**
- **Therapist**: Jackie Dunagan (LMFT, AAMFT Approved Supervisor)
- **Session Quality**: Great session - doing better than ever
- **Relationship Status**: Strong and improving
- **Counseling History**: Been seeing Jackie since 2014 (11+ years)
- **Location**: [GROW Counseling](https://growcounseling.com/team/jackie-dunagan/) - Alpharetta location

## Notes

- **Morning Connection:** The 30-minute morning routine is important for relationship
- **Flexible Schedule:** Pharmacist schedule allows for some flexibility
- **Supportive Partner:** Understanding of work demands and business priorities
- **Family First:** Prioritizes family time and relationship maintenance
